meanings.sent1: She was always agreeable to trying new foods.
meanings.sent2: The weather was agreeable for a picnic in the park.
meanings.sent3: It was agreeable to see everyone enjoying the party.
meanings.sent4: The idea of compromise was as agreeable as a warm hug.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh cookies baking in the oven was agreeable to everyone in the house.

meanings.sent1: The agreeable music put everyone in a good mood.
meanings.sent2: The garden was filled with agreeable scents of flowers.
meanings.sent3: The agreeable surprise made her smile from ear to ear.
meanings.sent4: The agreeable taste of the cake was like a party in her mouth.
meanings.sent5: The agreeable view from the top of the mountain took her breath away.

meanings.definition: Suitable or conformable to one's wishes or needs.
meanings.sent1: The schedule was agreeable to her work-life balance.
meanings.sent2: The hotel room was agreeable for a comfortable stay.
meanings.sent3: The agreeable size of the shirt made it a perfect fit.
meanings.sent4: The solution presented was as agreeable as a tailor-made suit.
meanings.sent5: The taste of the dish was agreeable to her specific dietary requirements.
